M

M18 - Enum constant in enum class enums.MovieRating
 
MainMenuView - Class in view
This is the MainMenuView class, which is the entry point of the application and is always the first view that the user of this system will see.
MainMenuView() - Constructor for class view.MainMenuView
 
MainMovieListingView - Class in view
This is the base View class for listing movies.
MainMovieListingView(ArrayList<Movies>) - Constructor for class view.MainMovieListingView
This is the constructor of this abstract class which requires ArrayList of movies as argument
MainSearchMovieView - Class in view
This is the base View class for listing options by which movies can be filtered or search.
MainSearchMovieView() - Constructor for class view.MainSearchMovieView
 
MainTop5MovieView - Class in view
This is an abstract View class which provides the implementation of presenting top 5 movies.
MainTop5MovieView(ArrayList<Movies>, MainTop5MovieView.Top5MoviesOption) - Constructor for class view.MainTop5MovieView
This constructor requires both the movies to be listed, as well as the criteria for which the movies are compared and ranked
MainTop5MovieView.Top5MoviesOption - Enum Class in view
This is an enum which defines the criteria by which the top 5 movies are calculated.
model - package model
 
modifyMovieWithNewValues(Movies) - Static method in class operator.DataOperator
When we want to modify the details of an existing movie in the database (Movies.txt), we can pass the modified movie object as parameter and the existing movie in the database will be updated.
MovieDetailView - Class in view
This View class presents the details of a particular Movie object
MovieDetailView(Movies) - Constructor for class view.MovieDetailView
This constructor initialise this class with a specified Movie object
MovieGoerBookingFilterView - Class in view
This View class is responsible for getting the filter mode from the user and filter the showtimes accordingly
MovieGoerBookingFilterView(Movies) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerBookingFilterView
This is constructor which requires a movie object as an argument
MovieGoerBookingHistoryView - Class in view
This class is responsible for showing the booking history that has been made by a movie-goer
MovieGoerBookingHistoryView(String) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerBookingHistoryView
This is the constructor which takes the username as an argument.
MovieGoerBookingShowTimeView - Class in view
This class is primarily responsible for showing the users the list of available showtimes
MovieGoerBookingShowTimeView(ArrayList<ShowTime>) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerBookingShowTimeView
This is the constructor, which takes in an ArrayList of showtime as in argument
MovieGoerMainView - Class in view
This View class is the main menu for the movie-goer
MovieGoerMainView() - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerMainView
 
MovieGoerMovieListingView - Class in view
This View class is responsible for printing the list of movies in the movie-goer module
MovieGoerMovieListingView(ArrayList<Movies>) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerMovieListingView
This is the constructor which takes an array of movies as an argument
MovieGoerPurchaseView - Class in view
This View class is primarily responsible for facilitating the booking and purchasing of tickets from movie-goer
MovieGoerPurchaseView(ArrayList<Seat>, ShowTime) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerPurchaseView
 
MovieGoerReviewingView - Class in view
This View class is responsible for getting review from the movie-goer
MovieGoerReviewingView(Movies) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerReviewingView
 
MovieGoerReviewView - Class in view
This View class helps to list reviews for a particular movie
MovieGoerReviewView(Movies) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerReviewView
This is the constructor, which takes a Movie object as an argument
MovieGoerSearchMovieView - Class in view
This View class presents for movie-goer the various options, each representing a method of listing ore searching movies
MovieGoerSearchMovieView() - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerSearchMovieView
 
MovieGoerSeatingView - Class in view
This View class is primarily responsible for facilitating the process of choosing of seats by the movie-goer before proceeding for booking.
MovieGoerSeatingView(ShowTime) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerSeatingView
This is the constructor which takes in the showtime as the argument and assign it to our private showtime variable
MovieGoerTop5MovieView - Class in view
This View class is responsible for showing top 5 movies (by sales or rating) for the movie-goer module
MovieGoerTop5MovieView(ArrayList<Movies>, MainTop5MovieView.Top5MoviesOption) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerTop5MovieView
This is the constructor, which has two parameter, the movie as well as the ranking criteria (rank by ticket sales or rating)
MovieGoerViewMovieView - Class in view
This BaseView class presents the various options for users for a given selected movies, such as booking of tickets or leaving reviews.
MovieGoerViewMovieView(Movies) - Constructor for class view.MovieGoerViewMovieView
This creates a new MovieViewingView with a given Movie object
MovieRating - Enum Class in enums
enumerates the different maturity ratings of a movie.
Movies - Class in model
Represents a movie that is screened in a cinema.
Movies(String, MovieStatus, MovieRating) - Constructor for class model.Movies
Creates a new movie with the given title, status and maturity rating.
MovieStatus - Enum Class in enums
enumerates the different showing statuses of a movie.
MovieType - Enum Class in enums
enumerates the different movie types.
